title: Don't Fight It | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Don't Fight It | Joel Osteen
description:
When we face difficult situations, our natural response is to pray them away. But nothing is a surprise to God. In due season, He’s going to remove the difficulty and use it to prepare you for the amazing future He has in store.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
